name: FACE HACK Blur + Bond Setting Spray
about: What it is: A clean, alcohol-free, and plant-derived setting spray that blends and bonds makeup with a cloud-skin finish. Finish: Natural.Formulation: Liquid.Highlighted Ingredients: - Holy Basil: Visibly brightens complexion and is rich in vitamin C..- Sugar Kelp: Soothes, minimizes redness, and adds hydration..- Oil-Absorbing Powders: Control excess sebum while maintaining skin’s hydration levels...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: This is a multipurpose, high-performance spray that blends all makeup textures during the application process, blurs and diffuses skin appearance, and bonds your look for all-day wear...Clinical Results: In a clinical study, immediately:.- Skin felt refreshed, hydrated and nourished.- This product gives a natural, radiant finish to skin.- This product sets makeup in place weightlessly..After eight hours:.- This product gave a natural, radiant finish to the skin.- This product sets makeup in place weightlessly.- Makeup did not fade or smudge..Clean.Clean at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing effectiveness.
ingredients: -Holy Basil: Visibly brightens complexion and is rich in vitamin C..-Sugar Kelp: Soothes, minimizes redness, and adds hydration..-Oil-Absorbing Powders: Control excess sebum while maintaining skin’s hydration levels....Aqua (Water, Eau), Acrylates Copolymer, Pentylene Glycol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Niacinamide, Betula Alba Bark Extract, Boswellia Serrata Extract, Polygonum Cuspidatum Root Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Laminaria Saccharina Extract, Ocimum Sanctum Leaf Extract, Hydroxyapatite, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Calcium Carbonate, Butylene Glycol, Zinc Sulfate, Pyridoxine HCL, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate....The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Shake. .-Hold six to eight inches from face and mist all over before, during, and after makeup application for a flawless, blended finish. .-Avoid direct contact with eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m in love with the spray but halfway through it starts spraying out funky. I’ve even tried to run hot water through the sprayer tube and nozzle multiple times and it still doesn’t help. It comes out sideways and chunky.  worth it anymore

reviews.review_title: I’ve finally found my holy grail
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have nothing to say but absolutely the best! I’m not the best with makeup but I’ve tried countless setting sprays and THIS is the one. Used before during or after it sets makeup beautiful and gives an amazing finish. I will be using this for life. If you’re using a makeup product that you like but it looks a little off try this before completing switching!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Am I doing it wrong? because I didn't not like how it made my make up look I'm going to have to return

When I used this, I noticed that it smoothed out my makeup and made it look pretty. The mist is perfect, however when I got close to the end on the bottle, it wouldn’t spray as nicely. Instead of a mist, it splatters and it gets messy around the nozzle. Tbh that’s the only downside. Overall, I really liked it and will probably repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this based on the reviews and the products didn't disappoint.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I don't know; maybe I'm missing something, but this thing is marvelously amazing for me. I have been using all-nighter (UD) for years; it used to work great for me, but over the years and as I got more experience makeup-up that is) I realized it was all that great so that I would test out others and one day I saw an influencer using this. I can not tell you how much I love this. makeupeup stays in place all day, and there is no transfer. I am about to order another bottle, maybe two.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tried it a few times and I don’t feel like it added any lasting power to my makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the Face Hack and Bond Setting Spray. I felt like it made my makeup look last a lot longer than others. It blended my look and made everything look flawless. I definitely recommend that you try it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This setting spray is so good! It ensures my makeup lasts me all day and doesn’t smudge. It also works great for dry skin and doesn’t make my skin feel dry. My face instantly glows and it’s become a staple in my routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time trying Freck and I love their packaging. I love that you can use the spray before, during and after makeup. I have dry skin and the spray made everything blend seamlessly. I would still use a mattifying spray along with this. Really good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm absolutely in love with everything about this blur and bond setting spray! I did a pretty heavy makeup look for a party recently and I wore that look from noon until the next day! ( it was a wild night lol) when I tell you that makeup looked just as fresh as when I first did it and didn't even transfer to my pillows I was honestly amazed! I use the gentle mist in between every step of my makeup and I really think that helped lock it in for as long as it did, (I also have a long lasting routine). Definitely try it!

reviews.review_title: Keeps my makeup from being cakey
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Face Hack  Blur + Bond Setting Spray works well to prime, blend, or set my makeup. I did have to shake it up and then spray my face. It came out with a fine mist and left my skin not sticky but matte. I can use this to keep my makeup from breaking throughout the day. I like that it keeps it looking smooth. I would avoid the eye area, though, making it feel sticky.

I absolutely love this product and the way that it feels on my skin after I have applied makeup on. It allows my skin to stay glowing without making my makeup look dull and dry!!! I will keep using this in my makeup routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! This spray is so refreshing to use all day long, to set your makeup, or a mid-day touch up. It definitely has a blurring finish that masks small imperfections. The sprayer gives a very even distribution. My makeup stayed on all day, & it even helped blend my makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the way this setting spray comes out. It’s a very fine mist that evenly covers my face. It helped my makeup last all day without touch ups. It also offered a slight blurring effect to help hide my pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this spray! It’s like hairspray for your face, but not in a sticky, stiff way. I keep mine in my car because I’m always forgetting to set my makeup. It’s a great refresher and super helpful to have when you’re anticipating some heat/sweating off makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best setting sprays that I’ve used! Plus it being a primer too!! I of course use it as both the primer and setting spray and my makeup looks absolutely fantastic! My makeup lasts all day without smudging or anything!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very happy to find that it sprays as a fine & even mist. I first applied it on half my face to compare any differences. It definitely provided a very blurred and diffused effect on the skin. It was also great for touch ups through out the day as I got oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this to set my makeup and also a few times mid day. The spray sprays evenly and it takes about 4 squirts to cover my whole face. I feel like it made my makeup last longer or helped kinda refresh it mid day. Especially in places where it got a little cakey or creasy. It def blurred out my makeup and made it. more flawless which I love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Product did what was promised. My makeup lasted all day and I didn't had to retouch as much as I do normally. Mist works well and it is very refreshing to use. Overall is a nice product if you're looking for a solid choice makeup setting spray .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Received this spray and I have used it a few times! The first time I used it as a setting spray but it dried down very sticky/shiny the second time I used it more as a prep first since it was so sticky and this is for sure the better way! I will say by a few hours in my face was pretty sling

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly the absolute best thing about this product is the sprayer. It is such a fine mist that easily covers my face without leaving it super wet or ruining my makeup. After I used this setting spray, I noticed that my makeup looked fresh and dewy which I loved. There is no smell to this so sensitive folks rejoice! I only used this product to set my face at the end of my routine and not during steps so I can’t speak to that but I found it did a great job of making my makeup last all day (even in 100 degree heat). Love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was a great setting spray and really locked in my base makeup over the whole day. I like the finish of the product and it made my makeup feel and look more smooth of an application. I would recommend.

reviews.review_title: super fine mist that sets my makeup all day
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best elements of this product is the mister. It comes out in the finest mist and doesn't end up in patchy blobs in areas of your face which is a problem I always have with setting sprays. You can tell that thought and care went into the packaging just based on the super fine mist it produces. The formula of this setting spray is good as well. I have had no issues with my makeup melting off or getting patchy when I'm wearing this. TLDR this is a good formula for a setting spray with great packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful setting spray. For reference I use this after I do my liquid and cream products before I go in with my powders. First, I love the spray bottle. It sprays an even mist of product without doing too much or leaving splotches. I also really love how it melts my makeup together

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes
reviews.review_text: I am so obsessed with this face hack, blur, and bond setting spray. It has worked so well for my skin. I love to use this after I apply my make up and on no make up days. I use it after my skin care. I would highly recommend to all my family and friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the packaging of this product. It goes on super easily without leaving splotches or big drops of spray on my face and it honestly helps with no transfer, especially after a gym day. With literally two spritz, you’re good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: a new must have in my routine! love how this increases the staying power of my makeup while also giving my face a soft blur! no other of my setting sprays give a blurring effect so it’s very innovative to me. also the mist is consistent and strong but doesn’t drown you in product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was really surprised how this gave me a glow but also kept my makeup in place all day. It misted evenly and dried down quickly. I noticed redness and acne didn't pop through my foundation during the day. This is a new favorite!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product gifted in exchange of my honest review. I have uses settings spray multiple time these past 10 days. It has a great consistency and keeps my make up set up properly for hours. Smooth finish!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was recently gifted this product in exchange for an honest opinion. How I like to use this as an oily oily skin girl is I spray it right after my skincare, right after my foundation and as my last step after powder. It melts everything together so perfectly and it helps my super matte makeup don’t feel too thick. The mist is very nice and it does not make you looks too dewy after spraying so much. I feel like I ran through it quickly because it is on the smaller size but it qualified for TSA liquid allowance so that’s nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am always looking for good setting sprays to add to my collection. I am also a girl who loves anything to blur my pores and make my skin look airbrushed. Well, this setting spray is the perfect addition to my collection. It blurs the skin without being too sticky. It prevents my makeup from budging at all when I use it. I love this spray so much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked the makeup fixing spray. It has a convenient fine spray that distributes the product on the skin very delicately. The product can be used throughout the day. It gives the skin a glow and long-lasting makeup

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this everyday before my makeup and after and I love it. before makeup it makes the application so easy and everything blended amazing. When I use it after my makeup it melts everything leaving a perfect finish. Plus the mist is perfection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The NEW FACE HACK Blur Bond Setting Spray by Freck Beauty lives up to its promises. It effectively blurs imperfections, enhances the longevity of makeup, and delivers a natural finish. The added skincare benefits are a bonus, making this product a versatile addition to any makeup routine. The setting spray comes in a sleek, modern bottle with a fine mist sprayer, allowing for an even and controlled application. One of the standout features of this setting spray is its blurring effect. Upon application, it delivers a soft-focus finish that effectively smooths out the appearance of pores and fine lines. This is especially beneficial for those looking to achieve a flawless, airbrushed look without the heaviness of additional makeup layers. The spray has a lightweight, non-greasy texture that feels refreshing on the skin. It dries quickly, leaving behind a natural, dewy finish that isn’t overly shiny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This setting spray is awesome!! I love that I can use it as a priming base and do my makeup and then set it too! It’s like the perfect combination of both. My makeup lasts all day and all night when I do this! It is so easy to use too. Just spray and let it dry. Doesn’t smell bad either!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with dry skin I always struggle to find a setting spray that prolongs the life of my makeup but also gives me the glow my skin needs. The mist on this is so fine and sprays really evenly while helping all of my makeup to blend and give a diffused  finish. Love this spray so much!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like this because I have sensitive skin and most setting sprays will irritate my or break me out. This helps my makeup last all day because I put my makeup on in the morning and go for a run on my lunch break and my makeup still lasts til the end of the day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first time I’ve used a setting spray that is in an aerosol bottle and I have to say, it works better than any other setting spray I’ve used! This has no scent, which I love. I don’t need all types of scents competing on my body. This kept my makeup on all day during a music video shoot in 90° weather in the South! It’s amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The face hack blur and bond setting spray is an effective makeup setting spray that also caters to blurring imperfections. It is a light weight non - greasy spray that applies evenly and dries quickly without leaving a sticky residue. It softens the appearance of skin texture giving it a flawless look. The finish is matte but maintains a natural radiance . The spray doesn't feel dry on skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love using this product before and after my makeup. It sprays evenly and covers my whole face in just a few sprays. It’s great to put under all of my products and the blurring effect is perfect. My base looks seamless! I also use it as a midday touch up and my makeup looks just as good as it did in the morning!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoy using this before I apply my makeup as a base that grips and holds it in place. After applying my makeup, I must my face again and my face is set for the entire day! Depending on conditions like humidity, you may need a midday refresh but it actually works so it's worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Tried out this setting spray and really liked it. I’m not the biggest fan of the smell but other than that it’s a good setting spray. I like how it sprays and it kept my makeup on all day. It’s also a good sized bottle and a good amount of product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was unfortunately very disappointing. I liked that it sounded like a can of spray paint when I shook it. I had high hopes for something great. I tried this for a few days in a row all using in a different way. No method showed any results. The only thing I did notice was if I tried this before applying makeup that it made it harder to spread out my foundation and I needed more product. No fragrance noticed which was good but like I mentioned this did absolutely nothing for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The mist is fine and dries quickly which is a plus!  I love how this sets my makeup into my skin and helps my skin  appear more “skin-like” rather than cakey!  It also gives my skin a nice glow that doesn’t look oily

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This setting spray is great! The packaging of the spray bottle is awesome because the mist is so fine which I LOVE for a setting spray — not soaking my face. It works well to keep my makeup in place all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love that it sprays a fine mist and sets my makeup to a pretty finish. I use it to blend out a concealer or blush by spraying on a brush or directly on face. It has a pretty long lasting finish that makes my makeup last

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like the packaging, the color is very subtle, the applicator blends well because it is very fine and does not damage the makeup, it looks hydrated at the same time, everything is in its place, I like that it has natural ingredients, it takes care of your skin at the same time, I like that it helps. It combines the foundation, blush and concealer that keeps the makeup in place all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Freck Beauty's Blur + Bond Setting Spray is a total game-changer! I've been using it as a midday refresh, and it's seriously so refreshing and hydrating on my skin. It gives the most beautiful blurred and diffused finish, like a soft-focus filter in a bottle.  The mist itself is super fine, and even – it feels luxurious. My makeup stayed locked in place all day long, and no touch-ups needed (other than the refreshing spritz!). I also found it really helped to blend everything together – concealer, foundation, blush – leaving a seamless and natural look.  If you're looking for a setting spray that does it all, this is it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This blur + bond setting spray is the absolute best thing ever. I really like that it is a multitasking product with clean plant derived ingredients. This helps prep the canvas and blends all makeup textures for a seamless and flawless finish that is long lasting and pure perfection.  I use this before and after applying my makeup and as a midday refresher and it works beautifully. It's literally a game changer and I highly recommend!

Good spray if you like the lived in look of makeup. I like when my makeup melts on my face and mixes together and this spray does that without the wait time or the effort of making yourself sweat. It’s also not expensive!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great setting spray. It’s help set all make up in place and blend concealer and base. I love the blurred finished. Its easy to apply, even in a middle of the day as a refreshing touch. And also make up stays all day. Definitely recommend to try it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This setting spray is very nice. I love the inclusion of a metal ball inside of the bottle! It allows me to ensure that the product is mixed well and sprays evenly. The mist is super fine and I haven’t had any issues with the nozzle clogging - which happens a lot of some other setting sprays I use! I think this does a great job of keeping my makeup in place, too. I’ve tried several methods of application - both before and after applying my makeup. When I apply the setting spray before my makeup, I spray it evenly and then tap it out to blend it with a beauty blender. When applied this way, I found the absolute only way to apply makeup on top of it is by also using a beauty blender - otherwise it will get patchy. I felt like this does a wonderful job of setting my makeup and keeping it looking fresh, but it didn’t do as good of a job as I like at keeping my skin matte in my t-zone. It’s a good setting spray and works really well, but I think it’s best for a few hours of wear as opposed to all-day use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am very picky about my setting sprays, so I wasn’t sure if this one was going to meet my expectations. However, it exceeded them! This spray helped my makeup stay on all day even in the heat and it made it look very clean and not cakey. I would absolutely recommend this product and would purchase in the future!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ugh it’s so good but I’m also not surprised at all! Freck makes such great products and this is just another winner for me. Gorgeous blur and sets my makeup beautifully. I really can’t complain, it’s good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Freck beauty has become one of my favorites like there cactus water toner and I have high hopes for this and it didn't disappoint it was light weight and held my macula all day in this humid Fl weather it has light scent that quickly goes away

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As an oily girly, I am always looking for new things to help blur and mattify. This setting spray helped blur but also rehydrate the look of my makeup. I do not think it actually mattified, but it allowed my powder to absorb nicely into my skin and blur out the layer. I love the noise it makes to as I shake it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how its a fine mist when spraying! I can tell the difference when it comes to blending my makeup after spraying this on. It blends everything so much nicer. All you need is a few sprays and your makeup will stay locked in all day! I really love the blurred finish. I also like spraying some on to touch up my face on a hot summer day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite way to use this product is as a mid day touch up. It’s extremely refreshing feeling, and definitely makes my makeup look fresh again. The mist is extremely fine which I love because it doesn’t feel like it’s soaking my face and messing up my makeup. I’ll definitely purchase again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first experience trying anything from Freck Beauty and I must say the experience has been AWESOME! I love a good setting spray, so I was so happy to find something new. I applied the setting spray after applying my liquids and setting with my powders and I am obsessed with how well it gave me that blurred airbrush look. My makeup looked like skin, and it lasted throughout the day (and it’s VERY hot in LA right now lol). I also loved how it felt on my skin! It felt super light which I loved because I have super sensitive skin. Overall, I was very pleased with this setting spray and I will keep in in my makeup routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the spray nozzle for this setting spray. It is a really fine mist that covers my entire face in only a few sprays. This setting spray held up pretty well throughout the day, and I didn’t notice any disruption to my makeup while applying it. I didn’t notice any blurring properties, but honestly I wasn’t expecting much because I don’t know how a setting spray would even be blurring. Overall it’s a good setting spray that holds throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The mist itself sprays nicely and is very fine, which I appreciate. Other makeup sprays I’ve tried can be too wet, but this sprays the right amount. It dries quickly and sets nicely; I applied it over my makeup on a hot, humid night out. I did notice my mascara smudge a little but that’s typical for me. Everything else set in place.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is an all in one. I apply my cream products then spray and blend. It makes blending work seamlessly and my products stay so well! I use this to set my make up at the end. About midday, I use this to touch up and refresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I always forget to use setting spray with my makeup but it makes sure a huge difference. Not only does my makeup stay all day and night but this spray helps blur impurities. Setting spray is a important part of your makeup routine. Love this stuff!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This face hack blur is a really good setting spray! It has very nice packaging where it sprays out its just enough! And there’s no smell to it or oily residue! It felt really nice on my face and helped my Mae up last all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m loving this face hack blur + bond setting spray so far. It works great to blend all my cream products and then I like to use it again when I’m totally finished with my makeup routine to lock all the products into place. Highly recommended purchasing this if you are a makeup girlie!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really nice mist! It’s super great for a midday touch up. Helps to lock my makeup in place all day as well as helps with blending of my makeup! Really nice spray nozzle as well and gives a nice mist!

reviews.review_title: One of the best I’ve tried
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This really impressed me on how well it set my makeup, holding it in place nicely throughout the day.  Disperses a nice superfine lightweight mist for an even application.  It has a slight fresh scent which is rather pleasant and definitely not overpowering. Gives a slight radiant and dewy finish which l personally really like. I’m quite fussy on setting sprays, but this one l would purchase again. My 40+ year old skin approved!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This setting spray I felt falls in the middle of the pack. Pros: I did like that it is a refreshing misting spray and helped to blend my liquid products. Cons: does have an acne pore clogging ingredient, did not help my makeup stay in place, and I actually felt like it disrupted the products after I put powder products on top. So this may be for someone who only used liquid products. It’s just not necessarily for me and my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been really enjoying this spray for midday touch-up. It’s refreshing and the mister is fine and even. It gives a blurred finish that helps blend any harsh lines/settling product nicely. I prefer this spray as a finishing spray rather than a setting spray as I feel the product longevity isn't significantly improved compared to other setting sprays.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m obsessed with this setting spray. It effortlessly smooths out texture and helps my foundation stay put all day, with a natural, dewy finish that feels refreshingly breathable. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Designed to blur imperfections, control oil, and prime the skin, to leave a cloud-like glow without mattifying. The unique gel-to-cream texture creates a smooth canvas for makeup to help improve and extend its wear. More than just a primer, the cooling metal applicator helps to depuff and tone the skin, while the Hyaluronic Acid infused formula provides an instant boost of hydration.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this FACE HACK Blur + Bond Setting Spray! I use this before and after makeup. Keeps it all in place, works well with other skincare products. Does not dry my face out or cause acne. Love the fine mist.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Freck Beauty NEW FACE HACK Blur + Bond Setting Spray is seriously a game-changer for my daily beauty routine. Not only is it super refreshing for those midday touch-ups, but it also gives my skin a gorgeous blurred, diffused finish. I’ve used this on my face after I’ve done my skincare but before my makeup as a primer and noticed it really helps my foundation and concealer stay in place.  The mist is flawless—just the right amount every time and it feel super lightweight; there’s no sticky residue. The only downsides? I wish it had a more noticeable scent (I’m a sucker for citrus or florals) and sometimes it takes a while to fully dry down, which can be a bit annoying when I’m in a rush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the Freck Beauty FACE HACK Blur + Bond Setting Spray for a few days now, and it's quickly become a staple in my daily makeup routine. With my combination skin prone to shine throughout the day, this setting spray has been a total game-changer. The first thing I noticed was the ultra-fine mist, which applies evenly without feeling heavy or sticky. It doesn't interfere with my makeup but instead creates a smooth, airbrushed finish by blurring pores and fine lines. The bond feature is equally impressive, keeping my makeup locked in place all day with no fading or transferring. I've even noticed that my foundation lasts longer, which is a major plus. Overall, I'm thoroughly impressed with the Freck Beauty FACE HACK Blur + Bond Setting Spray. It's now a must-have in my routine, and I can't imagine going without it. If you're searching for a setting spray that truly lives up to its claims, I highly recommend giving this one a try

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the Freck Beauty FACE HACK Blur + Bond Setting Spray for the past few days, and I have to say, it has become an essential part of my daily makeup routine. As someone with combination skin that can get a bit shiny throughout the day, this setting spray has been a game-changer. The first thing I noticed about this product is the fine, even mist it produces. It doesn't feel heavy or sticky on the skin, and it doesn't disrupt my makeup at all. Instead, it helps to blur the appearance of pores and fine lines, creating a smooth, airbrushed finish. The bond aspect of this setting spray is also incredibly effective. It helps to keep my makeup in place all day long, without any fading or transferring. I've even found that it extends the wear of my foundation, which is a huge bonus. Overall, I'm thoroughly impressed with the Freck Beauty FACE HACK Blur + Bond Setting Spray. It's become an essential step in my daily makeup routine, and I can't imagine going without it. If you're looking for a setting spray that truly delivers on its promises, I highly recommend giving this one a try.
